salemission_already_started: A sale mission task is already in progress.
is_already_sold: This warehouse has already been sold.
not_enough_money_in_bank: You don’t have enough funds in your bank account.
db_error_insert: Something went wrong while saving. Please try again.
you_bought_warehouse: You have successfully purchased the warehouse.
only_owner_can_do: Only the owner can perform this action.
player_is_already_manager: This player is already a manager.
received_manager_invite: [%s] has invited you to manage [%s] warehouse.
raw_material_task_already_being: A raw material collection task is already in progress.
rawmaterial_task_started: Raw material collection mission started. Get in the vehicle.
sale_mission_started: Sale mission started. Get in the vehicle.
raw_material_task_in_progress: You can’t proceed until the raw material task is complete.
sale_mission_in_progress: You can’t proceed until the sale task is complete.
raw_material_vehicle_full: The vehicle is full. Return to the warehouse.
need_upgrade_interior_to_start_work: You need to upgrade the interior to start production.
need_least_employees_to_start_work: You need at least %d employees to begin production.
warehouse_full: Your warehouse is full. Collect the packaged items.
production_completed: Production completed. Package added to warehouse.
production_stopped: Production stopped due to insufficient materials.
no_payment_salemission: The customer didn't like the order and refused to pay you, you were robbed!
customer_made_payment: The customer has paid, you can go to the next destination
salemission_vehicle_empty: The vehicle is empty. Return to the warehouse.
cannot_enter_sec_system: You can't enter while the security system is active
confiscate_warehouse: Everything inside was taken and dissolved
raid_warehouse: Your warehouse was raided by the police and everything was confiscated

ui.modal_money_washing_desc: Upgrade the money laundering section to level {{level}} in your warehouse.
ui.desc_upgrade_raw_materials_stock: Expand your raw material storage capacity.
ui.modal_theme_update_desc: You’re about to switch to the {{theme}} theme. Changing themes will destroy all produced packages. Are you sure?
ui.name: Name
ui.desc_invite_manager: Add new managers to your business.
ui.desc_raw_materials_and_drug_sale: Starting a business in our city requires raw materials, crucial for growth. Be cautious of the police when selling.
ui.desc_working_info: Ensure your resources are stocked and you have enough workers before starting production. More workers increase production speed and capacity.
ui.desc_buy_any: You are about to purchase this item. Do you confirm?
ui.desc_upgrade_vehicle: Upgrade your vehicle to carry more raw materials.
ui.desc_hide_map_blip: Show or hide the map marker.
ui.desc_security_system: Install security systems and cameras to prevent theft.
ui.desc_interior_light: Turn the warehouse lights on or off.
ui.desc_transfer_company: Enter the ID of the person to transfer ownership to.
ui.modal_terminate_warehouse_desc: This warehouse will no longer belong to you.
ui.desc_security_camera: Monitor the exterior of your warehouse.
ui.info_safe_actions: Deposit both dirty and clean money into the safe. Clean money is required for salaries and resources. Production cannot start without sufficient clean money.
ui.modal_payment_employee_desc: Do you agree to pay employee salaries?
ui.modal_noneed_desc: This action isn’t necessary right now.
ui.desc_recruit_employees: Hiring more employees boosts production speed and output, but increases costs.
ui.modal_upgrade_vehicle_desc: Current level: {{1}}. Upgrading your vehicle increases its capacity to {{2}} packages.
ui.modal_upgrade_raw_materials_stock_desc: Current level: {{1}}. Upgrade to increase storage capacity to {{2}}.
ui.modal_upgrade_interior_desc: Current level: {{1}}. Upgrade your interior to unlock production with necessary equipment.
